title: Tuning the high-entropy perovskite as efficient and reliable electrocatalysts for oxygen evolution reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18117-18125
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02680B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ruixue Wei, Gaoliang Fu, Huafeng Qi, Hewei Liu
This work reports a high-entropy perovskite La0.3Sr0.7(CrMnFeCoNi)0.2O3 as a high-performance OER electrocatalyst. Sr doping induces the formation of higher-valence Cr6+, Mn4+, Fe4+, Co4+ and Ni3+ responsible for the excellent OER activity.
